column2: Inc.|"Prenosis is revolutionizing precision medicine with ImmunixTM

column4: which is a collection of time series biological data that is coupled to clinical and outcomes data – the world’s largest and most rapidly growing dataset of its kind. The technology has the potential to save millions of lives per year and billions of dollars in healthcare spending.
